title: Waste Efficiency Argyle Square case study
name: UC00150_Waste_Efficiency_Argyle_Square_case_study
description: Comprehensive analysis of the Argyle Square smart bin program. Investigating if the smart bin program has been effective in measuring and assisting with the waste management since its beginning in 2022. It uses the Argyle Square smart bin public data as the case study for all smart bin implementations throughout melbourne. It uses multiple data analysis techniques and data visualisation to understand and analyse the data set, providing a comprehensive list of issues detected in the dataset.
